website_summaries.verdict: A top seed variety and brand that most customers rave about. Starts fast and gets lush in no time, especially if you aerate. Best for yards with mixed sun and shade.
pros: A diverse blend of grasses that includes tall fescues, perennial ryegrass, and Kentucky Bluegrass
Black Beauty Ultra does well in hot or cool climes
Even excels in clay soil if you aerate or till
cons: Germination rate varies, and some report weed seeds in the mixture
Estimated coverage area per bag is exaggerated

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many grass seeds....but this is the best yet. Solid growth with thick blades. You have to properly prepare the soil and top dress with peat moss to have nice even germination which takes work but it's worth it! I sprayed my original lawn and killed it and waited a month to make sure the chemical was fully gone. Skimmed the whole top layer of soil/dead grass off. Then hand tilled the soil and added a very think layer or new top soil. Spread the seed and then threw peat moss on top and within 5 days there was amazing growth.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a test to see if they would send fresh seed or old relabelled seed- It was fresh
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for years- outstanding results every time- I bought this on amazon this time as a test to see if they would send me fresh seed or relabelled/ multi year old junk as I have had happen with other brands. This stuff had been packaged less than 4 months from when I bought it- it was fresh- and the price was ~20% better than the retail stores. I will purchase again- Jonathan Green takes pride in there product and they don't let old seed languish on the market
customer_reviews.author: Tarek Abdel-Baset

customer_reviews.title: What a DUD!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in October for fall overseeding and to repair an area where topsoil was dumped during summer landscaping project. Prepped and overseeded lawn in fall with minimal results. Waited until spring to reattempt. Prepped area with topsoil and fertilizer. Re-seeded lawn on 3rd of April. ZERO growth on second reseeding attempt. Wasted $82 and my time. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great seed
customer_reviews.text: This grass is really hardy. We had a very large bare patch in a very shady area. The grass took even in an area with pine needles. I will definitely buy this grass seed again
customer_reviews.author: J. N.

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too happy this purchase. I may have gotten a bad batch but very little seed germinated. I've used a lot cheaper grass in the past that had worked better than this brand. Unfortunately, I assumed the high price would equal higher value and I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sammm

customer_reviews.title: Nice green, but slow to germinate
customer_reviews.text: When it takes, it takes well. Slow to grow but comes in very green. 25lbs to overseed 10,000 sq feet is a little light if you have patches. Used 3 bags to repair a lawn that had been really getting patchy. One bag did not do as well as the other 2. I've just ordered a 4th bag to fill in the last of the patches. It's not cheap, but it's done better than plugs and other products so far.
customer_reviews.author: B Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am very disappointed, I was really excited about this seed reading all the reviews . I am versed in the procedures of seeding having done this before using other seeds and having success . I took all the necessary steps and sadly my seeds didn’t take at all anywhere . I tried them in different areas thinking maybe it was a soil issue and or prep . Nope .. i dont know if I received a bad batch ... i dont know but I didn’t get any grass I guess I will Go back to my other suppliers .
customer_reviews.author: Jen p

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: The grass grew as expected and it's a pretty color of green. In the fall, we plant grass seed in a couple of decorative planters that we set near the front door (idea courtesy of Martha Stewart). The grass makes a nice fall display that holds up to cold temps. We typically use the leftover seed to patch some bald spots in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Marthy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic germination rate!
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows the first mow after over-seeding and filling in some bare spots. Used magical plus, black Beauty ultra seed, and Jonathan green starter fertilized. Excellent germination rate. I dethatched lawn lawn really well with green works dethatcher, moved very short, applied products listed above in the same day. I did not rake the seed into soil. Watered three times a day for 6 minutes the first two weeks, then watered 25 minutes every other day for the last two weeks. Did this Sept 6th I’m Michigan when temps were still around 70 degrees during the day and dropping Down to 50-55 degrees at night.
customer_reviews.author: Bond, James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Too Little Germination
customer_reviews.text: I decided to test this item with Scotts EZ Seed 17540 Sun Shade. Because the Scotts product has fertilizer and mulch built in, I put in the extra work of dropping additional top soil and starter fertilizer into area where I put on the Jonathan Green. Well, I got a few grass seeds to grow, but it my lawn looks like Homer Simpson hair. The area where I put down the Scotts came in full and beautiful. I really WANTED to support a smaller company, but at the crazy high price for this seed, it just doesn't work. I've got about 2/3 of the bag left is someone wants to come pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: C. D PAPAS

customer_reviews.title: I did sprout
customer_reviews.text: Nothing sprouted. I'm a gardener, so i did what was needed. But 0. Back to using Scott's... "Update" So I realized today that little grass has sprouted where I seeded! I changed the 1 star to 4. Hasn't sprouted everywhere I put it, but it has in many spots.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: Grew very fast!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cover a whole section of my backyard where the dogs dug up, and along the new sidewalk we replaced. It says 10-14 days to germinate but this is my new grass after day 5. I'm very happy with it. It took me a whole day but I spread the entire bag by hand, as well as sprinkled dirt by hand to make sure it was a thin layer on top. This is day 8! Grows incredibly fast and it's a gorgeous dark green... cant wait to see what it looks like after 14 days!
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE RAY

customer_reviews.title: Grows well in Shade!
customer_reviews.text: Seeded a large area under several pine trees this spring, and it's coming up beautifully. It's mostly partial shade and has had to compete with several weeds from the forest nearby, but has been growing very well so far. I laid it down with a broadcast spreader and watered regularly, in a different section I used Pennington Deep Shade, and in a third area I used Scotts Shade mix. This product is performing a bit better than the Pennington and much better than the Scott's. I am very pleased with the result so far.
customer_reviews.author: NightOwl

customer_reviews.title: Not a Real Jonathan Green distributor - fake company
customer_reviews.text: Brand new topsoil, professional lawn treatment and watering everyday as specified -- not a single blade of grass has grown from either bag of this seed. . I will update in another month, but after waiting 3 x weeks for anything, not holding my breath that this product will work. . This is not a real Johnathan Green Distributor - contacted this company and they informed me that this is a fake company.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same seed for years and I never had a problem with it but this time my lawn became a weed lawn, no grass came out of this bag .i am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: isa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing result second time in a row
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed!!! This is the second season I’m using Jonathan Green Ultra and still nothing I have bare patches all over my lawn and I put so much effort and growing this grass and at the end still nothing I’m very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Jonathan Green 10323 Black Beauty Ultra Mixture, 25-Pound
customer_reviews.text: I hated my lawn last year in 2018. Towards the Fall season of 2018, I decided to give this seed a try! I thatched, aeriated, limed, and fertilized with Scotts. I applied a lot of this seed! I doubled their rate for over-seeding... Look at the difference between my neighbors on the right and my Johnathon Lawn... Thank you Mr Green . lol I'm hooked... Big difference, huh? It works...
customer_reviews.author: GZEUSJ

customer_reviews.title: Despite follwing the Jonathan's instructions, Nothing grew at all!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one 25lb bag... but had also aerated, prepped and watered according to the Jonathan's site and no trace of anything! Nothing at all grew!!! I am pissed :-( What a waste of money. Unlike other seed products this has no warranty.
customer_reviews.author: TCS529

customer_reviews.title: First Mow at 24 Days Since Planting
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, Jonathan! 😭 I live in the desert, daytime temps have been in the low 90's F / ~32 C. Planted May 23.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Buy directly from Jonathan Green
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it was with one of Amazon's sellers. A generic seed was sent and it had a Jonathan Green sticker on it. Definitely not Black Beauty Ultra. It was also expired. Seed only lasts two years under the best of environments. Make sure you get what you pay for by buying directly. Price is the same and you will get within 3 days. I got my money back but now I'm going to be overseeding mid October.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Fujii

customer_reviews.title: Barely growing
customer_reviews.text: I prepped and over-seeded the ground more then a month ago according to the directions and additional walkthroughs by lawn pros on YouTube. Have been watering the ground regularly with the hose sprinkler and lawn irrigation, but the seeds are just now starting to grow, and only in small patches. I laid weed and feed about a month before seeding since we have mild winters here, so maybe that’s affecting the seeding? I don’t know. Just not having a good experience overall for the price of this grass seed.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Some of the grasses germinated in a week. By 1.5 weeks they were an inch tall. Keep in mind blue grasses take up to 21 days to germinate so don’t stop watering. Keep them wet for two months as seedlings will die if they dry. I sprinkled the 3 times a day if it didnt rain, about 730 am, noo, and 530 pm
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! I have never seen grass grow so big so fast, North East Pennsylvania planted late August
customer_reviews.text: Finally time to plant new grass and I am amazed with this seed! I actually saw growth within 3 days now a week after planting and daily watering (Did not luck out with any rain) and I am not exaggerating, the grass is 5 to 6 inches high and no bare spots, amazing!!! my soil is not even that great and some is in full shade, some in partial and some in no shade with no visible difference in the growth results. I seeded bare dirt along with this starter food (maybe this had something to do with it?)  and you can easily use one bag of the starter for two 25 pound bags of seed.
customer_reviews.author: Spelunk68

customer_reviews.title: Grew mostly crabgrass
customer_reviews.text: This has been the most disappointing and upsetting grass seed I ever used. It was used in a 10 x 15 foot area of new and prepped loam, watered, protected and maintained. It has become the eye of that section on my lawn. 80% of what grew was mostly crab grass along some other weeds. I recommend avoiding this seed or give as a gift to someone you hate. Incredibly dissapointed in the product and frustrating as I now have to remove all of the crabgrass.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Best seed ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband raked the areas where the crab grass had turned brown and died off in early October and applied the seed with a spreader. I went away for 2.5 weeks and when I returned I was amazed at how green the yard was. We have acid soil in the NJ Pine Barrens and have a very hard time getting stuff to stay alive. This seed is really worth paying the extra money for. I will be getting a second bag for the rest of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: mdemo1

customer_reviews.title: Nice seeds! Fast and hearty
customer_reviews.text: When you are trying to grow Kentucky blue you want Kentucky blue and not a bunch of mixed grasses. I like this seed for its quality and that fact it actually grows and comes in fast. I bought two types and planted them at the same time. The other one didn't hardly germinate any seeds and it was a huge waste of money. This seed actually grew and I mean grew. It might not be the least expensive to buy but it turns out to be since it goes farther and fills in so thick. Would definitely recommend this brand over the others.
customer_reviews.author: D. L

customer_reviews.title: Finally green!
customer_reviews.text: Growing strong! Keep well watered. Aerated and seed sliced. Patience... Some seeds sprouted fast, then some later. Went back and reseeded and tore up ground where growth was weak. I used a partial topsoil mix in some areas do to rain wash. Being a new home build they steal your soil and you have what is left which is clay and rocks. To avoid seed loss, aerate your yard and seed slice. Don't let your seeds dry out or you are wasting money. I am always optimizing my lawn treatment and this really boosted my lawn. I used Scott's fall feed and that really boosted the growth.
customer_reviews.author: Pete L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the seeds, but how amazon stores them
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have used these seeds before, bought at a local dealer. With Covid, things were close, so couldn't go that route. I was surprised to see them on Amazon, but I needed to seed for the Spring so I purchased them. I tested the soil to make sure PH was on point, and then proceeded to overseed. I am not 11 days later nada, these seeds are duds. I can say that Jonathan Green is good quality product been using them for awhile now. However, Amazon storage probably is what failed.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Tuazon Tacuyan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: You will be luck if 5% of what you plant comes up. I used it on Scott's lawn soil that was tilled, applied it according to the directions, watered it as per directions, and about 5% of the seed germinated. Total waste of money. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Waste money
customer_reviews.text: Wasted money, I bought two bags of these seeds it was beautiful the first 3 weeks of spring, as soon the temperatures start getting 70 degrees burned out, Water the lawn every morning and evening, we had a los of rain as well , the grass never grows or recovered, I hired a lawn company to inspected to see if I did something wrong and what they said basically the seeds is a crap, I will never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Zone 8b it worked!!
customer_reviews.text: We have never been able to grow anything but Bermuda grass. Our soil is very dry and clay. We tried this before going with a very expensive sod figured if didn’t work only out 100 dollars, if it did saved 1k. Well within 8 days we saw sprouts this is day 11 and still filling in but it looks as though we saved 1k. We live in zone 8b we watered three times a day for about ten minutes at a time it is also extremely windy we used the entire bag on approximately 2k Sqft.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous one

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I use Jonathan Green steps 1-3 on my lawn beginning in March and then in the fall I aerate and overseed with Black Beauty Ultra. I have been doing this for the past 3 years and we have one of the most full, plush lawns I have seen. Jonathan Green products are a little more expensive, but are well worth the extra money in my opinion. Also, I order all of my Jonathan Green fertilizer and seed in the winter months and they seem to be a lot cheaper than if you wait until spring and summer when the demand is high.
customer_reviews.author: RJK9600

customer_reviews.title: Good once but then disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this twice. The first time it was great. However, the second time I received this... a label slapped over it saying Ultra. Not cool. Had to return. Was not the same. Not sure what happened. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Lush
customer_reviews.text: Against expert advice, I planted the seeds in Maine during an unusually hot two weeks in an area devoid of any grass. With daily watering, the grass seeds sprouted and grew as I had hoped. Now it is October and the grass blades are a thick, lush, beautiful shade of green and the prettiest part of my wreck of a lawn. I guess next spring I use this for the entire yard.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Really is a beauty!
customer_reviews.text: Follow instructions and won’t be disappointed. So happy with this product. My lawn feels soft and fluffy compared to the bermuda grass that had overtaken my lawn. Killed it and started from scratch. 6 lbs for this small area. Paid off!
customer_reviews.author: Stephon

customer_reviews.title: See Before & After Picture
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best seed. I went from the worst lawn in the neighborhood, to the best. TIPS YOU HAVE TO DO FOR IT TO WORK: 1) Kill ALL weeds - Use Tenacity with a Surfactant. 2) Aerate the lawn - rent an aerator for a day at Home Depot or another store. 2a) Optional: Dethatch the lawn 3) Use Black Beauty Seed with a spreader 4) Use startet fertilizer after seeding 5) Water twice a day (morning and evening) for 5-10 mins If you fail to do these steps, you will likely not have much success. Just don’t blame the seed
customer_reviews.author: BagelSandwich

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: 3-25lb bags and 1-7lb bag.82 pounds of this seed and it ALL DIED.I brought in 10 yards of topsoil,put in a sprinkler system and it is ALL DEAD.Nothing but a few weeds left.Sun or Shade makes no difference.What a disappointment and waste of money and hard work.Look elsewhere....
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great results for fall overseed.
customer_reviews.text: Good germination, nice dark green grass, does take a few weeks to get going. Grass seed was fresh, and as far as I can tell, it all germinated. Used as a fall overseed, but my lawn was so bare from neglect - it was almost a do over. I spread at overseeding rates. Coverage was excellent regardless of being spread a bit thin. Lawn is like a carpet now - and I’ve gotten more than a few compliments. I’m looking forward to how it looks in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Marc G.

customer_reviews.title: Knowing that as getting taller and darker green
customer_reviews.text: I decide to star all over with my yard i use to have an ugly grass in my yard so i decide to kill my lawn and star over .. i have heard alot good things abut Jonathan green black beauty ultra grass and I'm so glad i buy this grass after i plant the grass seed 5 days later star to germinate and 2 weeks later my grass is almost 3 inches tall i just can't believe how awesome this product is. so happy about it
customer_reviews.author: juan ramirez

customer_reviews.title: High quality seed!!
customer_reviews.text: Here are 2 before and after pics. This seed germinated nicely and quickly. I am in Northern Virginia, and let the summer destroy my lawn as I did not follow a good watering routine. I dethatched, aerated and over-seeded on September 3rd 2019, The pics shows the new grass after the first mow on Sept 24th 2019, in 21 days my grass was thick and healthy. I highly recommend this grass seed. **make sure you do the prep work before seeding, also you must water the seed/lawn at least twice a day for 15-30 minutes to keep the ground moist to get the best results..
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: mixed results.  What has grown is doing well.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to purchase three of these to cover roughly 450 sq. feet. Not sure if the rain swept it away, birds ate it, or just got a dead lot. First bag didn't grow well.. the second did much better, but I still have some holes to fill up. Hopefully 3rd is the charm. What has grown looks good and is doing well (planted it under a large tree in the shade)
customer_reviews.author: I'm Rich James

customer_reviews.title: Good seed
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what these people are doing that say the grass is slow to germinate. I used my aerator, put down Scott's starter fertilizer and this seed. 7 days later I have small grass sprouting up. The photo is 5 weeks after seeding. My bag was dated June 2019 its September 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be Planting Weed Seed
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT recommend purchasing this seed. The verdict is still out on the germination (Over-seeded 3-weeks ago and it’s been spotty). However, you will find that each bag consists of a varied composition of seed, specifically a percentage of “weed seed” and “other seed,” which usually consists of POA weed. If you are really set on this seed—buy it in a store so you can view the label and check the % of weed seed—you will more than likely still be planting 1000’s of weeds in your lawn. Do yourself a favor before you potentially waste a lot of hard work. Find a local seed supplier in your area and search for your preferred seed with 0% weed seed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Visibly green in 8 days
customer_reviews.text: Other than being expensive, my husband and I are happy with his choice of seed. We live in mid-MI, seeded mid-Sept and had a few high 70s days after seeding. We watered once per day in the first 8 days before we got some rain. Super happy with the results after 13 days! Our house is a new build and we had a lot of sand brought in and then a fresh layer of top soil brought in.
customer_reviews.author: wine.wife

customer_reviews.title: Waste of your money
customer_reviews.text: I did two tests of 1000 seeds to see what percentage would germinate, only 3% and both test germinated. This must be all seed that has deteriorated over time. It is very hard to know how old I see is in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grass seed
customer_reviews.text: Super fast germination. Nice quality turf growing in very well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Grass Seed
customer_reviews.text: I overseeded with this product in early Fall and it germinated quickly and established quickly. I would recommend this product and will purchase again next year to overseed. I live in the Pacific Northwest and even though technically the seed isn’t ideal for this area it still worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: BriGuy911

customer_reviews.title: Mean and GREEN
customer_reviews.text: Great product for reseeding your lawn. Followed the directions and within 6 days it was sprouting. Has filled in my lawn very nicely and has a nice green color that blends in beautifully with my lawn. If it looks this great going into fall... I can't wait till spring of 2019. Very pleased with this purchase and will surely purchase again in the future. Envey of the neighborhood 😁
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL GRASS
customer_reviews.text: I SCORTCH EARTHED MY YARD AND BEGAN PLANTING FOR A NEW YARD. BEAUTIFUL GRASS WAS COMING UP IN 7DAYS. FULL YARD OF BEAUTIFUL GRASS IN 21 DAYS. I DO HAVE SOME WEEDS GROWING, HOWEVER I BELIEVE THAT IS MORE TO DO WITH THE DIRT I USED PRIOR TO RESEEDING. ABOUT READY TO APPLY THE WEED N FEED BY JONATHAN GREEN. I AM A TRUE BELIEVER OF THIS PRODUCT. ALL OF MY NEIGHBORS ARE RAVING AND ASKING ABOUT MY YARD.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonique Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Overall the seed would work pretty well here in Colorado
customer_reviews.text: Overall the seed would work pretty well here in Colorado. I’ve used to Scotts brand of seed before and I wouldn’t say that is any better or any worse.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Results were excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Last summer we had high heat and drought conditions late in the summer which burnt the grass out. I decided to overseed the lawn with this product last fall. This year my lawn has recovered and looks great while my neighbors lawn is still splotchy and brown. We use the same lawn service for fertilizer so the only difference is my use of the Jonathan Green seed.
customer_reviews.author: SCS2

customer_reviews.title: Get it, plant it, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Dude, this is the stuff. Couldn't give it six stars, but I would have. You know that root depth is the holy grail of grass growing, right? When the roots are deep you can water heavily (1.5 inch/week) but infrequently. That way the very top of the soil layer dries out (goodbye weeds) but the deep roots stay moist (hello dark green lawn). It took a full two weeks to germinate, so make sure you have some protection if you get wind. The color is EXCELLENT....came in a little bluer than I wanted, but greened up as it filled it. Makes Augusta National look like hardscrabble. Get it, plant it, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thoreauwasabedwetter

customer_reviews.title: Best Grass Seed Period
customer_reviews.text: There is no other grass seed worth talking about. You plant this seed & you get a Lawn not just grasss. I have been using Black Beauty now for the last 6 years and its the only grass seed that grows with very little care and looks like a million dollars
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Thick,dark green and came up quickly
customer_reviews.text: I used this seed to overseed about a third of a acre..i had alot of crabgrass and weeds that i killed off first..i power raked the area first than put seed down and put soil over it.I've been doing landscape work for about 35 years and never seen seed come up like this did.i watered it 2 times a day and it came up in 6 days,thick and dark green.I would highly recommend this seed to anyone looking for a beautiful lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Osterman

customer_reviews.title: Grass is Growing
customer_reviews.text: We had a tree removed and a large bare spot. The grass is growing where the bare spot is. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dulcist

customer_reviews.title: First time user, seeing results after 4 days!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Got really good results. First time laying down seed ever and it was practically fool proof if you have some idea what you’re doing. Accidentally left sprinkler on for an hour and didn’t have all the proper tools but still got ^% of germination. Will definitely be buying this product again!
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Help!! No lawn and spent to much.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes with getting this grass seed from the reviews I had read. I prepped my lawn perfectly before adding the grass seed. 10 to 20 days later and still the seeds won’t germinate. I’ve watered them twice a day as required and the correct fertilizer to help it. It could be me for all I know but this isn’t my first lawn I’ve brought back to life. I would like to try again but the price is just to high to make the same mistake twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seed for any condition
customer_reviews.text: This seed will grow in the worst of conditions. A clay and weed infested yard in full sun all day to lush thick grass
customer_reviews.author: SeaBass

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Although I followed instructions on how to apply this, the grass never grew. What a waste of money and time. Bought another brand which worked. So, it wasn't me or my soil. I now have this large expensive bag of grass sitting in my shed taking up space. Maybe I can use it as bird food???
customer_reviews.author: seven seas

customer_reviews.title: no germination
customer_reviews.text: I laid this down over a month ago, and watered to keep moist daily. NO germination. I even put some in a planter with soil to check, and 3 planters as such did not germinate. $80 in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Scott

customer_reviews.title: Deep Dark Green Slow to Germinate But Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Yes it’s slower than mostly rye bag but if you water daily for 2 weeks and let nature handle the rest (no droughts) it looks great. It’s a deep dark rich green grass. It looks amazing. The only bad side is that if it’s a section you did most likely it sticks out and the other section of your current turf is a different color. I suspect the original grass is more of a Kentucky blend.
customer_reviews.author: JRV81

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Grass Seed
customer_reviews.text: Terrible grass seed. Haven’t seen a single blade of grass after 3 weeks. Total waste of money! Seller return/defective policy is shameful. Jonathan Green grass seed is bad and much more expensive than Scott’s and Scott’s grows grass. UPDATE—Spring after fall plant: never had mire weeds in my yard!! Confirming my poor opinion of this junk seed.
customer_reviews.author: GSO-Amazon Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I did a total kill last fall and planted this seed. This what my lawn looks like today. Spent over $500 in the fall to water it. It came in beautifully and look fabulous this spring until 90 degree wether hit about 3 weeks ago. Now it looks awful. Don’t waste your money on this grass seed.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin P

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fine green grass blades
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat patchy new growth despite cheese cloth overlay. Seeds manually spread over ~100 sq ft area from which weeds had been excavated and the dirt shaken off. I sprinkled about 3/4 of the 3# bag over that area and covered with cheese cloth. No fertilizer and watered only a few times - we've had a lot of gentle rain. I cannot figure out how to attach photos. Perhaps as this grass matures it will fill in the patches.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar R. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced non germinating
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on reviews coupled needing a dark grass blade color and effective germination. Essentially got not of this and with only a 7 lb bag this is really a very bad deal
customer_reviews.author: AeroEng

customer_reviews.title: Tried this for first time
customer_reviews.text: Germination is slower than the big store seed But I'm liking the results since overseeding on Labor Day. Daily watering is important. I found some areas lagging on germination but found fault to be the sprinkler system, adjusted that and grass popped. Will repeat process again next fall to build hopefully a great lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy on here again
customer_reviews.text: I received an expires bag. The germination rate is probably way below from what the bag says. I also didn't notice it had other crop seed and weed seed in the bag. For the price, I would expect the seed to be weed and other crop free.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar H

customer_reviews.title: All died
customer_reviews.text: Everywhere i planted it, I prepped, seeded, watered as i have an irrigation system. It came up in the spring and now it has died, I have nothing but bare dirt. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Casten

customer_reviews.title: How Old is the Bag I Received?
customer_reviews.text: All grass seed has a shelf life. I wish the producers would include the "best buy" date on the bag so that you'll know how fresh the seed really is. I don't know what that magic timeline is but I've heard about one year. I'm happy with all of Jonathan Green products so far even though they are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hawn

customer_reviews.title: Jonathan Green.  You will get GREEN grass.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but the best grass seed. Will buy only Jonathan Green. Everything they say about it is true. You will definately see the difference from other brands. So get planting.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Ouimette

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: I used the seeds to fill in some bare spots and to over seed my lawn. Some of the seeds in the bare spots started growing in a reasonable time then died shortly after although they were adequately watered. I don't know how the over seeded areas did. I saw no positive evidence.
customer_reviews.author: P. B.

customer_reviews.title: Black Beauty is the best lawn out there.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to fix our lawn where we had to dig up a section for sewer line. It is gorgeous grass. It comes in greener and sooner than the surrounding lawn where we didn't replant. We ended up using it to grow our entire back lawn and it's doing really well also.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Nothing came up very disappointed had to buy more seed which is not starting to come up but what a waste of my time and water
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Best grass ever!
customer_reviews.text: This grass is the best I have ever seen. I am also allergic to grass but this stuff doesn’t bother me a bit when I cut it. Like all new growth it needs to be babied but once established you won’t be disappointed. I am in Oklahoma and this stayed green until January. About a month to a month and a half later it was green again. The pictures were taken in March 2019
customer_reviews.author: Seth Brownell

customer_reviews.title: crabgrass new seeding all good worked well) but these seeds did not take completely
customer_reviews.text: Spent a ton of money on all the Johnathan products (love your lawn, magical, crabgrass new seeding all good worked well) but these seeds did not take completely. Mid april I cut the grass short (for over seeding), applied these seeds with rotary spreader, applied 1/4" of new top soil, again applied these seeds with rotary spreader in case some areas i buried the seed to deeply with top soil. Watered daily ($300 water bill as proof) Expected all bare areas to be filled in. But that's not the case. Still have plenty of bare spots. For the cost of all the product in addition to the cost of these seeds (25 pound bag) one expects way better results.
customer_reviews.author: Max E.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works if your conditions are right.
customer_reviews.text: Best grass seed I have used here in MD. I run a small mowing business and have done aerate / Overseed on about 30 yards with a variety of seed. The mix of fescue, perineal rye, and bluegrass works great. You must take the time to get a soil test and ensure your soil is right before you blame the grass seed.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Failure to germinate!!
customer_reviews.text: I planted this grass seed August 14th did not germinat I water it three times a day The crabgrass is doing better than this stuff I would expect it to grow for the price I paid for it I cannot recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mplumie

customer_reviews.title: Jonathan Green 10323 Black Beauty Ultra Mixture, 25-Pound
customer_reviews.text: If you are not convinced this seed is worth the extra money take it from someone that planted seed side by side with another name brand seed. This seed easily popped up 2 to 1 over the other seed. I can't wait to see the finished growth. I highly recommend this seed it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A.

customer_reviews.title: Patience
customer_reviews.text: I put this down in March to overfeed my lawn. I wasn’t convinced it was the right thing to have done until early May. Now my lawn is thicker than it has ever been, a beautiful green and grows quickly between cuts. Best it has ever looked.
customer_reviews.author: KYRetired

customer_reviews.title: not expired.
customer_reviews.text: The seed came in great condition it was not expired and it grew really well. I will light so much that I bought a second bag. I plan to throw down a lot of it this fall coming up. Hopefully it grows like a nice Green carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Dixon

customer_reviews.title: JUST THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: THIS SEED IS JUST THE BEST EVER. I WILL RECOMMEND THIS SEED TO EVERYONE. AFTER IT STARTED TO GROW I HAD RANDOM PASSER BYES STOP AND COMPLEMENT ME ON MY LAWN !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Wojcio

customer_reviews.title: Great decision and choice!
customer_reviews.text: We just put this down about 4 weeks ago after having a new drain field put in. The grass is just beautiful. It begs being walked on in bare feet. Really. I had considered sod but though I’d try the seed. Sure am glad I did. It’s gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Out There

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Don’t waste your money. Got maybe 3% germination and I had very good seed to soil contact. The return policy on this is an absolute fraud and Amazon should not be selling this product
customer_reviews.author: Greg Behrens

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT.  Patchy, weeds, doesnt work well.  Minimal germination rate.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 bags of this expensive seed, and grass is very patchy, not full- at all, and even has lots of weeds growing in the middle of it!! Days and many hours of prep work, watering LOTS and LOTS everyday for 2 months...
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and I need to purchase another bag for the areas of my lawn that are still brown. But, the grass is green and full in places where it used to be brown and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience beware
customer_reviews.text: Hired a professional landscaper which cost a lot of money and spent a lot of money on water to plant this grass seed as directed in the spring that one seeds sprouted and seller refuses to refund
customer_reviews.author: puppy9

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent product!
customer_reviews.text: This “black beauty” grass bag was actually just a normal grass seed with a sticker of black beauty over it! Do not buy! They are frauds!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Expecting fast new grass.....look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a dud!! No growth in over four weeks. I will change this review, if something happens in the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Gordie

customer_reviews.title: Is this for real?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure where the reviews of this brand come from, but I could not, for the life of me, get these to germinate. I made several attempts in ideal conditions, and I believe the birds got more than the soil. I normally stay away from Scott's stuff, but even their seeds perform better. Perhaps I got a dried up bag or something....
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great grass product for my reseeding project! The quality of grass far exceeds any other grass seed that I've used in the past. The grass seems greener and strdier than what I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon W.

customer_reviews.title: Did not grow any new grass
customer_reviews.text: I killed the weeds, aerated, put down this seed, put down starter fertilizer, and watered for 4 weeks straight - I see very little new grass.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get nearly as much new grass as I had hoped when I over seeded with this. Some bare spots have filled in, but the existing grass didn't get any thicker. I'll probably try a different brand next year.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Think Growing Grass takes Magic?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been able to grow grass... until J Green. Worth its weight in gold!! Must water daily and planting in the early autumn worked for me, covered with straw during germination
customer_reviews.author: Jarek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the seed. Pictures are from MA and exactly 28 days apart.
customer_reviews.author: Blackops

customer_reviews.title: seed ,,huh
customer_reviews.text: Didn't cover the spot,, where a tree ..once stood. !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel_fan_72

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best seed for the Northeast. Sprouts in 10 days or so but roots run deep making it very drought resistant. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: This is my go-to mix after trying bunch of others.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different mixes with mediocre results. Went to lawn care forums and was pointed to this mix. Worth. Every. Penny.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I put the seeds and i put more seeds and more seeds and nothing happened for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: mike33914

customer_reviews.title: Grows, that's all I needed
customer_reviews.text: Put the seed down last Thursday on bare spots in the backyard, also used the Jonathan Green sodding and seeding fert and Love Your Soil, topdressed with some peat moss. Today is Monday and already seeing some growth with once to twice a day watering (it hasn't been too warm). Hopefully it fills in properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sherayne L.

customer_reviews.title: Good sees
customer_reviews.text: Good seeds I use in in central NJ come out pretty good but I think I was little too let to over seed. Still grass come come nicely, let’s see next spring should be get more thicker or over see one more time next fall.
customer_reviews.author: mc

product_meta.title: Jonathan Green 40322 Black Beauty Ultra Grass Seed, 7 lb
product_meta.description: Germinates quickly & fills in damaged lawn areas better. Possesses species diversity, contains black beauty tall fescues, Elite Kentucky Bluegrass & perennial ryegrass to produce a dark-green & uniform lawn. Contains naturally insect resistant grass. Excellent heat & drought tolerance.
feature_bullets: Black beauty grass plants have an invisible waxy coating, as you'd find on an apple, which wards off disease and preserves moisture in the leaf for superior drought tolerance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars192 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
